description:
Ponygon has returned with his partner Kafk Sunbeam to help Zatch and Kiyo! Kafk reads the first spell “Shudoruk,” and Ponygon morphs, armor-clad and battle-ready. He dashes towards Dalmos and fearlessly pounces on him, all the while effortlessly evading h
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: メルメルメ~! ウマゴン電光石火!!
